name: insya.tools
title: Brackets Tools
description: Brackets developer tools (- Html, Url, Decode/Encode. - HTML Tag Strip - Word, Line to Array or List, - Remove empty, blank, break lines. - Remove duplicate lines. - Remove line numbers. - Word Highlight. - Trim, Left, Right Trim. - First, Last x Char Remove. - To SEO Url. - Html5 Template.
author: Yasin Kuyu <yasinkuyu@gmail.com>
